## Description {#details}

Implementation of <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memorysanitizer-cpp-/vararghelper">VarArgHelper</a> that is used for ARM32, MIPS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscv">RISCV</a>, LoongArch64.

Finalize function instrumentation.

This method is called after visiting all interesting (see above) instructions in a function.
